title: 130+ Good Morning Prayers, Blessings & Quotes for Her

steps.title: Remind her God’s got her back with these motivating messages.
steps.content: Remind her God’s got her back with these motivating messages. Whether she’s got a tough day ahead of her, or you just want to ensure her day is a pleasant one, these empowering blessings are sure to help her remember she’s capable of great things, and that God will support her through anything. Good morning! I pray God leads you to victory today. I’ve never known a fiercer warrior than you! Amen! I know you have the strength and grace to face this day—and I pray that you know it too. May the devil look at you today and turn around and run in the opposite direction. I pray to God that you feel nothing but joy on this day, come what may. You can do anything through Him who gives you strength! May the Lord guide you and keep you today and every day. You’re capable of more than you know. When you’re in despair, when you doubt yourself, when you feel alone in the world, I pray that you remember that God is watching out for you and that He loves you—and so do I! I pray you remember how strong you are. There are shadows on the horizon, but God will lead you through whatever difficulties you face—and I’ll be waiting at the end of the day with a hug and platter of cookies! My lovely friend, I ask God to shield you from trouble—but I know you can face whatever evil comes your way. I ask God to protect you with His mighty hands, that you experience nothing but His grace and favor today. Dear bestie, I pray you remember how worthy of love you are! You are capable of handling anything the devil hurls your way today. Dear God, please protect and comfort my friend as she navigates the world today. Amen. I ask God to bless you with strength, devotion, and energy today! I pray that the Lord keeps you safe and strong today, and that you never forget how beloved you are in His eyes (and mine, too)! I ask our Father in heaven to shower you in His love today, and remind you you’re capable of more than you know! You got this!

steps.title: Put a smile on her face with these tender good morning blessings.
steps.content: Put a smile on her face with these tender good morning blessings. Feeling a little sentimental? These sweet and sincere prayers and messages will help her start her day knowing she is loved and cared for . Good morning, dear. Every day I thank God for you. I pray your day is a joyful one and that God bestows many blessings on you. Good morning, my dove! I pray that you experience the boundless love of God today and every day! Amen! Hello! I thank God for your presence in my life, and I pray He guides your steps today with love and gentleness. I pray you remember how much God loves you and that He watches over you today! May your day be as bright as your smile and as lovely as your heart. Wake up and greet the sun! Flowers, smiles, and laughter are waiting for you. As you start this beautiful new day, may your heart always be filled with gratitude. Good morning, my everything. Good morning! May your day begin with a smile and with happiness for your soul to embrace. I don’t know what I’ve done to deserve your friendship, but I thank the Lord every day for it! Have a beautiful day today. Each and every morning is a blessing from the Almighty for which we must be thankful. [1] X Research source May God give you all the strength to face the challenges in life today and every day. Good morning! Good morning to the rainbow who fills my life with color. May God bless you and keep you! May every morning of your life shower you with blessings. Praying for a beautiful and memorable day for you, my dear. This day is a gift from God—I pray you are able to find beauty in it! I pray that you take joy in the sunrise, the smell of coffee, and my love. Your energy is unmatched, your smile lights up a room. I pray that you never forget how special you are. Good morning!

steps.title: If she’s on a tight schedule, these short blessings will do the trick.
steps.content: If she’s on a tight schedule, these short blessings will do the trick. Woodford notes that meaningful prayer is less about how long you spend praying and more about your presence and devotion—even if the prayer is short and sweet. These blessings are made for a woman on-the-go, but they’re no less meaningful and encouraging: May today bring about untold blessings for you. In His name, amen. May you feel confident in the divine plan the Lord has for you on this day. Amen. Today is a gift. Let’s cherish the present. Wishing you a successful day! Good morning sunshine! I am so blessed to have you in my life. Time to rise and greet the sun! May the Lord guide you today! I pray for your protection and your happiness, today and always. I pray you feel God’s unflagging love today, my cherished one. Good morning! Remember you are a beloved daughter of God. May God shower you with blessings this morning! Praying for a beautiful and fulfilling day for you, my dear. I pray that your day is as wonderful as you are! I ask God to bless you and guide your steps today, beautiful soul! You are my heart and my spirit, and I thank God for you every day. Good morning. May God bless your day with joy, peace, love, and strength. I pray you never forget you are fearfully and wonderfully made, my bright star.

steps.title: These blessings are perfect for your wife or girlfriend.
steps.content: These blessings are perfect for your wife or girlfriend. Your good morning prayer is also an opportunity to show your significant other just how much she means to you. These romantic blessings will let her know how grateful you are to God for your relationship: Every day I thank God that you are my wife. I would be nothing without you! My love, I pray that God holds you in the palm of His hand today, that He cares for you with the tenderness and watchfulness of a shepherd for a little lamb. My darling one, I pray you remember how kind, intelligent, beautiful, creative, and funny you are today—I know I thank God for it every day! Good morning, darling! I pray that you experience nothing less than an amazing day. Good morning, my love. I still can't understand why I deserve such happiness, but I thank God for you every day. I love you more than words can say, my dear. May the Lord guide your steps and keep you from harm. Amen. You are my North Star, and my life is a compass that keeps pointing toward you. Good morning, my star. May your day be as radiant as your smile. The best feeling in the world is knowing that you are mine, and I am yours. Every morning, that's enough for me to have a great day. I wake up each day more grateful to have you in my life. Thank you for choosing me. I pray the Lord helps you to grow closer to Him each day and to deepen your faith in His love and grace. The desire of my heart is for us, as a couple, to draw closer to each other by drawing closer to God. My days have become brighter and my mornings sweeter since you have come into my life. Good morning, my love. Hello, my dove. I am grateful to God for your unwavering love and support. I pray He continues to bless and lead you. I praise Him for deepening our relationship with each other every day. Good morning, my love! I pray God grants you strength, courage, and wisdom as you go about your day. I love you. Good morning to the most beautiful woman in this world. You are the queen of my heart, and I cannot imagine my life without you. I pray that God protects you and that you feel His love. I praise God Almighty for the wife He has given me. There is no one else I would want to do life with. I count myself blessed beyond measure to have you by my side. As Proverbs 18:22 says, “He who finds a wife finds a good thing and obtains favor from the Lord.” I pray that God blesses you today with good health, strength, confidence, and faith. I love you. Good morning to you, my one and only. May you have a lovely day. I pray that the power of the Holy Spirit engulfs and empowers you today, my love. I thank God for giving me such an amazing wife! What have I done to deserve your love? I don’t know—but I will continue to strive to prove myself worthy of it every day. I pray you feel the comfort of God’s love today, as well as my own. My dear one, your kindness is a balm to my soul. I see the evidence of God’s love every day in you, my cherished one. May He lead you today and keep you safe. I pray that God blesses our marriage with unity, understanding, mutual respect, love, and laughter, and that we continue to be a source of inspiration and strength to one another.

steps.title: Let her know how much her companionship means to you.
steps.content: Let her know how much her companionship means to you. Where would we be without friendship? As Proverbs 17:17 says, “A friend loves at all times.” Share how grateful you are to God for your female friend’s presence in your life with these messages: I thank God every single day for your love and kindness. May He smile on you today! Amen! I am grateful every day for your endless compassion, brilliance, and humor. May God bless you today! I pray that you experience God’s unfailing love today, and that you feel joy and peace every moment. I pray you have the confidence and courage you need to pursue your dreams and overcome any challenges you may face in the day ahead! Peace be with you, my dear friend. Good morning, my friend! Today, I ask God to surround you with His protective arms and let you feel the comfort and warmth of His eternal love. This morning, I pray that God blesses you with guidance, strength, and wisdom as you navigate the world today. I pray you find fulfillment in your work, and I am faithful that you will use your many talents to make a positive impact in the world! I pray that God sends his angels to shield you and shepherd you as you go about your day. I pray He covers you with His unfailing mercy and love, and that you continually feel His presence and take comfort from it. Amen. May you experience joy and satisfaction today, and know the love of the Lord. May the Lord’s presence guide you and give you comfort today, my dear friend! It is through your friendship that I am who I am—I pray that God keeps you safe and happy today as you move through the world. May you laugh today, and may you feel God’s presence in all that you do. Amen. I pray that our Father in heaven protects you from the distractions and temptations of this world and that He surrounds you with a community of believers who can support and encourage you in her faith. I pray the Lord keeps you safe and that you experience His divine peace today. Your friendship is such a gift! I am truly blessed to have you in my life and I pray your day is wonderful. I pray the Lord watches over you today, my loving and lovely friend. I pray you feel no doubt or despair today, my friend—but if you do, remember I am here by your side, and so is God.

steps.title: Ask God to protect her and guide her today.
steps.content: Ask God to protect her and guide her today. Offering an encouraging blessing to someone is a great way to help them begin their day with a positive mindset. But it’s also worthwhile to pray for others on your own. Try using one of these prayers next time you want to ask God to shield and offer His mercy and love to a woman in your life: Dear Father, I ask You to please protect my wife as she moves through her day. Keep her from harm, and imbue her with spiritual wisdom to handle any obstacle that she encounters. Amen. Dear Lord, I ask that You comfort my friend today and help her feel Your love and faithfulness. Lord, I lift up my beloved friend to You. Teach her to walk in Your ways, to seek Your wisdom, and to serve others with a graceful heart. I come before You today with a heart full of thankfulness and love for my girlfriend. I implore You, Father, to strengthen her with confidence in her faith. Let her light shine brightly in each and every corner of her life. Father, please grant her wisdom to discern Your will in her life. Let her take comfort and confidence in Your everlasting promises. Dear Father, I pray for my wife’s protection today. I ask that You surround her with Your everlasting light and that she feels the warmth of Your loving embrace. Dear Lord, I pray You guide my friend today. Help her to see the world through Your eyes, to recognize the beauty and grace in each soul she encounters. May she be a reflection of Your perfect love, extending kindness and compassion to all. My Lord, let her be a testament of Your unflagging love and kindness today and every day. May she walk in Your footsteps, dear Jesus, and guide others to You in love and wisdom. Dear Father, I pray for my daughter today. Bless her with the bravery to stand firm in her faith and values. May she be a shining light of Your love, inspiring everyone around her!

steps.title: Send her an encouraging verse to remind her God is with her today.
steps.content: Send her an encouraging verse to remind her God is with her today. The Bible is full of inspirational messages about God’s unfailing love and mercy. Considering accompanying your blessing with a relevant quote from scripture to make your good morning greeting even more meaningful: “The steadfast love of the Lord never ceases; his mercies never come to an end; they are new every morning; great is your faithfulness.” —Lamentations 3:22-23 [2] X Research source “But the Lord is faithful. He will establish you and guard you against the evil one.” —2 Thessalonians 3:3 “Fear not, for I am with you; be not dismayed, for I am your God; I will strengthen you, I will help you, I will uphold you with my righteous right hand.” —Isaiah 41:10 “‘For I know the plans I have for you,’” declares the Lord, “‘plans to prosper you and not to harm you, plans to give you a future and a hope.’” —Jeremiah 29:11 “The Lord is my shepherd, I lack nothing. He makes me lie down in green pastures, He leads me beside quiet waters, He refreshes my soul. He guides me along the right paths for his name's sake. Even though I walk through the darkest valley,I will fear no evil, for You are with me; Your rod and Your staff, they comfort me. You prepare a table before me in the presence of my enemies. You anoint my head with oil; my cup overflows. Surely Your goodness and love will follow me all the days of my life, and I will dwell in the house of the Lord forever.” —Psalm 23:1–6 “Weeping may endure for a night, but joy comes in the morning.” —Psalm 30:5 “But I will sing of your strength; I will sing aloud of your steadfast love in the morning. For you have been to me a fortress and a refuge in the day of my distress.” —Psalm 59:16 “Satisfy us in the morning with your steadfast love, that we may rejoice and be glad all our days.” —Psalm 90:14 “This is the day the Lord has made: let us rejoice and be glad in it.” —Psalm 118:24 “Your word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.” —Psalm 119:105 “Let me hear in the morning of Your steadfast love, for in You I trust. Make me know the way I should go, for to You I lift up my soul.” —Psalm 143:8 “Commit to the Lord whatever you do, and he will establish your plans.” —Proverbs 16:3 “And we know that in all things God works for the good of those who love him, who have been called according to his purpose.” —Romans 8:28 “Look to the Lord and his strength; seek his face always.” —1 Chronicles 16:11 “Cast all your anxieties on him, because he cares for you.” —1 Peter 5:7 “Do not be anxious about anything, but in everything by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known to God. And the peace of God, which surpasses all understanding, will guard your hearts and your minds in Christ Jesus.” —Philippians 4:6-7

steps.title: Inspire her with words of wisdom from others.
steps.content: Inspire her with words of wisdom from others. Not sure what to say? Try sending your loved one a motivating and deep quote from spiritual leaders and other notable figures: “Love is our true destiny. We do not find the meaning of life by ourselves alone—we find it with another.” —Thomas Merton “Let nothing disturb you, nothing frighten you, all things are passing, God is unchanging. Patience gains all; nothing is lacking to those who have God: God alone is sufficient.” —St. Teresa of Avila “Be fervent in God, and let nothing grieve you, whatever you encounter.” —Hadewijch “If the only prayer you said was thank you, that would be enough.” —Meister Eckhart “Somewhere in those depths of silence I came upon my first experiences of God as a loving presence that was always near, and prayer as a simple trust in that presence.” —Cynthia Bourgeault “You do not need to know precisely what is happening, or exactly where it is all going. What you need is to recognize the possibilities and challenges offered by the present moment, and to embrace them with courage, faith and hope.” —Thomas Merton “Even if you do the best you can in all things, your human nature must often fall short; so entrust yourself to God's goodness, for his goodness is greater than your failures.” —Hadewijch “Spirituality is not to be learned by flight from the world, or by running away from things, or by turning solitary and going apart from the world. Rather, we must learn an inner solitude wherever or with whomsoever we may be. We must learn to penetrate things and find God there.” —Meister Eckhart “God will bring people and events into our lives, and whatever we may think about them, they are designed for the evolution of His life in us.” —Thomas Keating “Faith does not need to push the river because faith is able to trust that there is a river. The river is flowing. We are in it.” —Richard Rohr “I believe in Christianity as I believe that the sun has risen: not only because I see it, but because by it I see everything else.” —C. S. Lewis “For human beings, the most daunting challenge is to become fully human. For to become fully human is to become fully divine.” —Thomas Keating “The shortest distance between a problem and a solution is the distance between your knees and the floor.” —Charles Stanley “Christ has no body now on earth but yours, no hands but yours, no feet but yours. Yours are the eyes through which to look out Christ's compassion to the world. Yours are the feet with which he is to go about doing good. Yours are the hands with which he is to bless men now.” —St. Teresa of Avila “You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.” —C. S. Lewis “There’s a place in the soul where you’ve never been wounded.” —Meister Eckhart “Friendship is unnecessary, like philosophy, like art.... It has no survival value; rather it is one of those things which give value to survival.” —C. S. Lewis “The people who know God well—mystics, hermits, prayerful people, those who risk everything to find God—always meet a lover, not a dictator.” —Richard Rohr “It is the duty of every Christian to be Christ to his neighbor.” —Martin Luther “Our job is to love others without stopping to inquire whether or not they are worthy. That is not our business and, in fact, it is nobody's business. What we are asked to do is to love, and this love itself will render both ourselves and our neighbors worthy.” —Thomas Merton “Whoever possesses God in their being has Him in a divine manner, and He shines out to them in all things; for them all things taste of God and in all things it is God's image that they see.” —Meister Eckhart “It is love alone that gives worth to all things.” —St. Teresa of Avila

steps.title: Trust that God will hear your prayer.
steps.content: Trust that God will hear your prayer. “I think prayer is the foundation for any religious practice, any relationship with the divine, and our connection to our soul, and spirit,” says Woodford. Whether you share your blessing with the person or you’re praying alone to God, it’s important to go into your prayer with faith that God will hear it and that He’s watching out for you and your friend. [3] X Research source Woodford reminds us that “God is always answering your prayers, even if you don't like his answer.” So rather than approach prayer with an expectation that God will give you what you’re asking, instead approach it with the trust that He’ll give you what you need—even if it’s not what you think it is. She also emphasizes letting go and letting God, noting that if you want to pray for someone who’s going through a difficult time, you can “pray for their protection” and for the “highest good to be done,” but avoid “trying to interfere,” and instead “appeal to the Divine to support” them.

steps.title: Try to personalize your prayer.
steps.content: Try to personalize your prayer. When you’re sharing your blessing with someone, personalizing it can make it even more meaningful. Try to tailor your prayer to the person, perhaps by referencing your relationship to them or your history together, or by referencing a specific situation they’re going through. For instance, if they’re your spouse, you might make your prayer more romantic and emphasize how grateful you are to be married to them. If they’ve got something stressful on their plate—say, an important job interview—pray that they do well and remind them you and God are on their side.

steps.title: Offer support and love.
steps.content: Offer support and love. First and foremost, your prayer should be a way to offer love and attention to those around you. Woodford observes, “People who are filled with the Spirit—it's like they bring light [that] other people respond [to].” As it says in 1 Corinthians 13:13, “These three remain: faith, hope, and love. But the greatest of these is love.” [4] X Research source Think of your blessing as an opportunity to imbue someone with God’s grace and compassion and help them feel encouraged to face whatever life may throw their way.
